General.Name: Amlak Intl for Real Estate Finance
General.Description: Amlak International Finance Co operates as a real estate finance company that provides real estate, SMEs, and personal financing services in Saudi Arabia. The company operates through Retail and Corporate segments. It provides finance products to small and medium sized businesses, individuals, corporates, high net worth individuals, and institutional customers. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: Ath Thumamah Road, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia
